meanings.sent1: The fructifications of the apple tree are a sign of a successful harvest.
meanings.sent2: The farmer eagerly awaited the fructifications of his labor in the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the fructifications from the tree and hid them in its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work and dedication finally led to the fructifications of her efforts, seen in the bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the fructifications filled the air, enticing all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The result or product of bearing fruit.
meanings.sent1: The fructifications of the strawberry plant were plump and juicy.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with colorful fructifications of various fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The chef skillfully arranged the fructifications on the dessert platter, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent4: The fructifications of her labor were evident in the delicious pies she baked.
meanings.sent5: The fructifications of the peach tree hung low, ready to be picked and enjoyed.
